actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry

official_title: To improve outreach and enrollment for the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program.
short_title: SNAP Education and Outreach Act of 2009

summary.text: SNAP Education and Outreach Act of 2009 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to provide grants to eligible entities for outreach and enrollment efforts to increase supplemental nutrition assistance program participation. Obligates 10% of such amounts for a national enrollment campaign.

titles.title: SNAP Education and Outreach Act of 2009
To improve outreach and enrollment for the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program.
